modName: God of War 4- Kratos RaceMenu Preset
summary: Kratos RaceMenu preset, from God of War (2018).
descriptionHtml:
You know the deal, don't have a ps4 so I made my own Kratos... :D

And to add some lore:
[i]
[/i][center][size=3][i]"After many years of battles, Kratos came upon the Norse realms. There, embedded on a ruin, he found a portal to another world. And as he wonders how he can ever go back, the land of Skyrim awaits ahead of him, taunting him into the unknown."[/i]
[/size][/center]

[b][size=4]REQUIREMENTS:Â 
[/size][/b]
-RaceMenu, of course:
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/


And if you want Kratos to look like the images above:

-Bald Head:
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3518

-Warpaint:
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1433

[i](Small warning, the bald head mod replaces the 'shaven' look in-game, so any characters using that will look completely bald.)

[/i]
[b][size=4]Recomended:
[/size][/b][i](Another small warning: apparently the warpaint mod causes a bit of visual glitch in the back of the head, to fix it, and have a much better looking Kratos, I recommend:)
[/i]
-XCE- Scarface
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24600

[i](They install as complexions in the game, and there is one that looks almost perfect with Kratos.)

[/i]



[center]I'm working on making the Leviathan Axe from the game, hopefully that'll come out soon.



This is actually the first mod I upload, so please be kind :)

If there is any questions I'll try to answer them as best as I can.



[b][i]This mod is exclusive to the Nexus

It is and always will be FREE![/i][/b][/center]
author: SPinc
